item.description:
Okay, so it's not really a hike, but it is a three mile walk, and for a good cause.

The 28th annual Walk Against Hunger takes place on Sunday, May 1, in Hartford. The event is a fundraiser for Foodshare and several other local anti-hunger charities. I hope you'll consider signing up, asking some friends, family, and co-workers to sponsor you, and coming out to join me. These days, Foodshare is needed more than ever.

To sign up to walk, follow these easy steps:

1) go to www.foodshare.org and click on the Walk Against Hunger logo

2) click on "Join a team"

3) put "Gloria" in the search box and press search

4) select "Gloria's Glorious Gang" and follow the steps to join her team

If you cannot walk, but would like to make a donation to support Gloria and her team, go here, and click on the "support" button to make a secure donation with your credit card.

Once you have signed up, you can raise money using the website tools to e-mail friends and family, or you can print out a brochure and go raise some sponsors the old fashioned way, with paper and pencil! Or, alternatively, if you want a paper brochure, send me an e-mail with your snail mail address and how many brochures you would like and I'll mail them. I can also mail a Walk poster or two if you have a place to hang it up.

On Walk day, come to The Hartford, on Asylum Avenue in Hartford between 1:00 and 1:30 to turn in your pledges and get signed up. Look for me about 1:45 near the stage and the Walk leaves promptly at 2:00.

Hope to see you there. If you cannot come, but would like to support those of us who are walking, you can go here to make a donation.

Gloria
